target.name: install-toolsjar
target.echo: installing local tools.jar in local maven: ${lib.path}
WARNING: this script requires that your JAVA_HOME environment variable points to the Java 8 JDK (not JRE)
note that under Eclipse, you can locally set your JAVA_HOME variable in "External tools configuration -> Environment"
WARNING: a successful build does not necessarily mean that you installed the right version of tools.jar
